question: Standard Chartered Bank opens new GBS centre in __________.
explanation: Standard Chartered Bank opened its Global Business Services (GBS) centre in Bengaluru which will complement its existing GBS centres in China, India and Malaysia. The GBS in Bengaluru will deliver support, client due diligence and advisory services for Standard Chartered's corporate and institutional banking customers. Latest technologies in data, robotics and software development will be used at this centre.
